roles.title: AI/ML Intern
roles.summary: Optimized and fine-tuned Vertex AI pipelines; boosted task accuracy 30%+, automated schema validation (−25+ hrs/wk), and sped up CI/CD velocity 20%.
bullets: Optimized LLMs on Vertex AI worker/QA pipelines, accuracy +30%+.
Multi-model evaluation (100+ models, 500+ endpoints) → data-driven deployment.
Vertex AI + Gemini schema validation → saved 25+ hrs/wk across 10+ services.

roles.title: Team Member — Virginia Tech (HokieTokie)
roles.summary: Led red-teaming for Amazon Bedrock; generated 117K samples, surfaced 2,480 vulnerabilities, built ShieldBot with GPT-4/Claude (56s detection), and ranked 1st (T2), 2nd (T1).
bullets: Attack frameworks (PAIR, PEZ, Crescendo) → 3K+ jailbreak prompts, 2,480 vulns.
ShieldBot (GPT-4 + Claude) with ~56s latency → blocked 50+ adversarial prompts/day.
Patch-and-retry with CodeGuru + skill augmentation → 983 atomic skills in 7 families.
Achieved 97% malicious compliance reduction, 62% fewer vulns, 46% fewer multi-turn jailbreaks.

roles.title: Intelligent Process Automation Intern
roles.summary: Built 3 chatbots automating ~70% of queries; latency cut 30s → <10s; adoption +50%; hackathon winner for +35% accuracy, −60% resolution time.
bullets: 3 AI-powered chatbots (Python, ChatGPT, Kore.ai) → ~70% query automation.
RESTful ChatGPT API + ML routing → latency 30s → <10s.
BERT NLP pipeline (React + PyTorch/TensorFlow) → adoption +50%, hackathon win.

roles.title: Software Maintainer
roles.summary: Modernized Summit ML workflows; containerization + CI/CD.
bullets: Modernized ML workflow subsystems (Summit) by containerizing services with Docker across AWS Lambda, S3, ECS.
Implemented CI/CD and IaC; streamlined integrations and enabled low‑downtime automated deploys.
Resolved conflicting Python envs; modular Docker setup reduced build errors by ~35% and accelerated delivery cycles.

roles.title: Wage Grader — ECE 4564 Network Application Design
roles.summary: Automated + manual testing for client‑server apps; faster grading.
bullets: Evaluated 50+ projects for protocol compliance, code quality, and architecture.
Assertion‑based + manual testing improved grading efficiency by ~40%.
Structured feedback on Python/Docker projects improved modularity by ~30%.
